verbose_text: Examination of the transcriptional response to iron starvation using qPCR and microarrays found that flavodoxin (isiB) is upregulated and that ferredoxin (petF) is downregulated, while some genes associated with the iron rich PSI and cytochrome b 6 f complexes are downregulated, presumably allowing the reallocation of iron.
evidence: ferredoxin (petF) is downregulated                                                          , while some genes associated with the iron-rich PSI and cytochrome b 6 f complexes are downregulated, presumably allowing the reallocation of iron
